body.p: And so I must stay two, if not three days longer for my books! they are to come by the Cambridge Fly, wch sets out from the Queen's Head in Grey's-Inn Lane. Mr Mason is here, but talks of going to London tomorrow, where he will be at Ld Delaware's House.
All letters to & from this place, that seem to promise any thing, are open'd (I hear) at the Gen: Post-Office.
